languages.text: {n}Абеляр скрипит зубами.{/n} "Нет, Лорд-капитан. В переполохе его след упустили. Отряды продолжают искать и его, и уцелевших в переплетениях коридоров бунтовщиков... но, справедливости ради, я не удивлюсь, если среди пропавших с палубы шаттлов недосчитаются одного. Боюсь, расплата будет ждать его нескоро".

{n}Abelard grits his teeth.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. In all the commotion, his trail went cold. Our people are still on the hunt for him and any mutineers who may still be skulking in the ship's many corridors... but, frankly, I would not be surprised to hear that we are now one shuttle short. I am afraid that it will be some time before he answers for all that he has wrought."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр скрипит зубами.{/n} "Нет, Лорд-капитан. В переполохе его след упустили. Отряды продолжают искать и его, и уцелевших в переплетениях коридоров бунтовщиков... но, справедливости ради, я не удивлюсь, если среди пропавших с палубы шаттлов недосчитаются одного. Боюсь, расплата будет ждать его нескоро".

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德咬紧了牙。{/n}“还没有，舰长大人，他的踪迹在一片混乱之中消失不见了。我们的人目前正在寻找他的下落，追捕所有潜藏的叛乱分子……但老实说，就算我们真的少了一艘穿梭机，我也不会过于惊讶。如果打算找到他，让他为这一切付出代价，恐怕得花些时间。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. In all the commotion, his trail went cold. Our people are still on the hunt for him and any mutineers who may still be skulking in the ship's many corridors... but, frankly, I would not be surprised to hear that we are now one shuttle short. I am afraid that it will be some time before he answers for all that he has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德咬紧了牙。{/n}“还没有，舰长大人，他的踪迹在一片混乱之中消失不见了。我们的人目前正在寻找他的下落，追捕所有潜藏的叛乱分子……但老实说，就算我们真的少了一艘穿梭机，我也不会过于惊讶。如果打算找到他，让他为这一切付出代价，恐怕得花些时间。”

languages.text: {n}Abélard serre les dents.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il a profité de l'agitation pour se volatiliser. Nos hommes sont toujours à sa recherche et continuent à fouiller le vaisseau jusque dans les moindres recoins pour débusquer d'éventuels mutins... mais honnêtement, je ne serais pas surpris d'apprendre que l'une de nos navettes a disparu. Je crains, hélas, que nous ne sachions pas de sitôt pourquoi il a semé tout ce chaos. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. In all the commotion, his trail went cold. Our people are still on the hunt for him and any mutineers who may still be skulking in the ship's many corridors... but, frankly, I would not be surprised to hear that we are now one shuttle short. I am afraid that it will be some time before he answers for all that he has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard serre les dents.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Il a profité de l'agitation pour se volatiliser. Nos hommes sont toujours à sa recherche et continuent à fouiller le vaisseau jusque dans les moindres recoins pour débusquer d'éventuels mutins... mais honnêtement, je ne serais pas surpris d'apprendre que l'une de nos navettes a disparu. Je crains, hélas, que nous ne sachions pas de sitôt pourquoi il a semé tout ce chaos. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard aprieta los dientes.{/n} «No, Lord Capitán. Durante la conmoción, su rastro se ha esfumado. Nuestra gente sigue buscándolo, a él y a cualquier otro amotinado que aún aceche en los pasillos de la nave... pero no me cabe duda de que a estas alturas nos falta una lanzadera. Me temo que hará falta más tiempo para hacer que responda por sus acciones».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. In all the commotion, his trail went cold. Our people are still on the hunt for him and any mutineers who may still be skulking in the ship's many corridors... but, frankly, I would not be surprised to hear that we are now one shuttle short. I am afraid that it will be some time before he answers for all that he has wrought."

Nuestra gente sigue buscándolo, a él y a cualquier otro amotinado que aún aceche en los pasillos de la nave... pero no me cabe duda de que a estas alturas nos falta una lanzadera. Me temo que hará falta más tiempo para hacer que responda por sus acciones».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは歯を食いしばった。{/n}「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン。騒ぎの中で、彼の足取りは消えてしまいました。私達は今も彼を、そして船内の通路に潜んでいるかもしれない反乱軍を捜索中でして…しかし、正直なところ、シャトルが1機足りない可能性もあります。彼が自身の行いについて喋るまでには、時間が掛かるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. In all the commotion, his trail went cold. Our people are still on the hunt for him and any mutineers who may still be skulking in the ship's many corridors... but, frankly, I would not be surprised to hear that we are now one shuttle short. I am afraid that it will be some time before he answers for all that he has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは歯を食いしばった。{/n}「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン。騒ぎの中で、彼の足取りは消えてしまいました。私達は今も彼を、そして船内の通路に潜んでいるかもしれない反乱軍を捜索中でして…しかし、正直なところ、シャトルが1機足りない可能性もあります。彼が自身の行いについて喋るまでには、時間が掛かるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Abelard beißt die Zähne zusammen.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain. Bei all dem Aufruhr ist seine Fährte erkaltet. Unsere Leute machen weiterhin Jagd auf ihn und alle Meuterer, die sich noch in den vielen Korridoren des Schiffs verstecken könnten ... aber offen gestanden würde es mich nicht wundern zu hören, dass uns ein Shuttle fehlt. Ich fürchte, es wird noch einige Zeit dauern, bis er für seine Taten bezahlt."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. In all the commotion, his trail went cold. Our people are still on the hunt for him and any mutineers who may still be skulking in the ship's many corridors... but, frankly, I would not be surprised to hear that we are now one shuttle short. I am afraid that it will be some time before he answers for all that he has wrought."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard beißt die Zähne zusammen.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain. Bei all dem Aufruhr ist seine Fährte erkaltet. Unsere Leute machen weiterhin Jagd auf ihn und alle Meuterer, die sich noch in den vielen Korridoren des Schiffs verstecken könnten ... aber offen gestanden würde es mich nicht wundern zu hören, dass uns ein Shuttle fehlt. Ich fürchte, es wird noch einige Zeit dauern, bis er für seine Taten bezahlt."

languages.text: {n}Abelard dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Hayır Lord Kaptan. Kargaşa içinde izini kaybettirmiş. Adamlarımız onun ve gemide hâlâ kol geziyor olabilecek isyancıların peşine düştü... Lakin bir mekiğimizin eksildiğini işitirsem pek şaşırmam doğrusu. Korkarım ki yaptıklarının hesabını biraz geç verecek gibi duruyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. In all the commotion, his trail went cold. Our people are still on the hunt for him and any mutineers who may still be skulking in the ship's many corridors... but, frankly, I would not be surprised to hear that we are now one shuttle short. I am afraid that it will be some time before he answers for all that he has wrought."
